channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kevin Spacey is ‚Äòrefusing to leave‚Äô $5.6 million Baltimore condo unit after foreclosure auction
item.description: The actor revealed back in June that he was being forced to sell off the home at in a bid to help cover hefty legal fees.

item.title: Eli Lilly releases new form of weight loss drug Zepbound for half the price to boost access, supply
item.description: Eli Lilly is offering 2.5-milligram and 5-milligram single-dose vials of Zepbound for $399 per month and $549 per month, respectively.

item.title: Eli Lilly releases new form of weight loss drug Zepbound for half the price to boost access, supply
item.description: Eli Lilly is offering 2.5-milligram and 5-milligram single-dose vials of Zepbound for $399 per month and $549 per month, respectively.

item.title: How do you hunt down short-term trades?
item.description: What chart do you look to for short-term wins? You know me, I don‚Äôt want to wait around too long for trades to pay out. But I also am not interested in taking on a bunch of sloppy, risky trades in hopes of getting those. That‚Äôs why I lean heavily on my Gamma Trigger System [‚Ä¶]

item.title: Nvidia has all the pieces in place for a positive quarterly earnings surprise
item.description: Having taken the lead in AI chips, Nvidia is bleeding its competitors dry.

item.title: 10-year Treasury yield rises as investors weigh likelihood of U.S. interest rate cut
item.description: The U.S. 10-year Treasury rose on Tuesday after the Federal Reserve boosted already high expectations for imminent interest rate cuts.

item.title: Europe markets mixed as mining stocks and autos gain
item.description: European markets were mixed on Tuesday as mining stocks gained on rate cut hopes.

item.title: Powell‚Äôs Jackson Hole pivot on rate cuts won‚Äôt be his last
item.description: The U.S. economy is too strong for the Fed to be so dovish about interest rates.

item.title: 'A different perspective': This top marine scientist is determined to resolve deep-sea mining's murky future
item.description: A change of leadership at the International Seabed Authority comes at a time of intense debate about the future for deep-sea mining.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg says White House 'pressured' Meta to 'censor' Covid-19 content
item.description: Zuckerberg said it was ultimately Meta's decision to take down any content, but he noted he believes that the so-called "government pressure was wrong."

item.title: Bitcoin surge has seen the number of crypto millionaires double
item.description: The number of individuals with more than $1 million worth of crypto holdings increased 95% in the 12 months ending on July 1, to 172,300 people

item.title: Amazon aggregators Branded and Heyday plan to merge as once-booming industry continues to shrink
item.description: The Amazon aggregator space, which faltered after venture capital money dried up and consumers returned to stores, continues to consolidate.

item.title: Britpop legends Oasis reunite for 2025 tour ‚Äî and demand for tickets is expected to be huge
item.description: Brothers Liam and Noel Gallagher will put aside a 15-year feud to reunite for a string of shows expected to generate feverish demand.

item.title: Big growth trading just 5 contracts? (see how)
item.description: Happy Friday! Rate cut coming in September! Let‚Äôs go! When you see a trader post about growing their accounts ‚Äúfast‚Äù, two drawbacks pop in your mind: Taking on a lot of risk Trading big position sizes The theory is you can‚Äôt have big rewards without big risks, so finding lots of growth means finding a [‚Ä¶]

item.title: Icahn Enterprises‚Äô stock closes at 21-year low after plan to offer up to $400 million of shares
item.description: Icahn Enterprises‚Äô stock tumbled 13% Monday to put it on track for a 21-year low, after billionaire Carl Icahn‚Äôs publicly traded investing arm filed to sell up to $400 million of its depositary units.

item.title: Judge orders 'Pharma Bro' Martin Shkreli to surrender all copies of rare Wu-Tang Clan album
item.description: Martin Shkreli is accused in a New York federal court lawsuit of retaining a copy of the Wu-Tang Clan album "Once Upon a Time in Shaolin."

item.title: Volkswagen China is spending lots of time at Xpeng to make new EVs
item.description: German auto giant Volkswagen is spending more time at Xpeng than the other way around, Xpeng co-president Brian Gu told CNBC on Monday.
